events.description: Major update introducing two new weapon types (Dual Blades and Lances), four new large monsters (Radobaan, Banbaro, Barioth, and Zinogre), a new sleep element, and a new hunting experience called Hunt-a-thons. The habitats have been updated with a winter theme and two new small monsters (Wulg and Cortos) have been added.

Zinogre will be the guaranteed fifth monster in all Hunt-a-thons. Completing exclusive Event Quests during this time will reward you with a new Hunter Medal. Zinogre will still appear in Hunt-a-thons after December 17, but at its usual rate.

New hunting experience where some gathering points turn into Hunt-a-thon Points, allowing you to hunt five large monsters in succession. Large monsters that you encounter in Hunt-a-thons are stronger than those that usually appear in the field.
